title: Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore: Personal Watercraft EA 2005
body: Personal Watercraft Use Environmental Assessment 2005       Personal Watercraft Use Environmental Assessment - July 2002 (168 page pdf)   Personal Watercraft Use Environmental Assessment Errata - January 2004 (24 page pdf)  Changes made to EA to modify the preferred alternative and its analysis, address public comments, and clarify the text   Finding of No Significant Impact, Personal Watercraft Use - September 2005 (8 page pdf)   Personal Watercraft Final Rule for Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, Federal Register - October 2005 (13 page pdf)  News Release: Pictured Rocks Publishes Personal Watercraft Final Rule     Boating
